mdRecord.dcterms:description: Confession of having a foot fetish by a purported sorority girl [work]
Student graffiti art and messages inscribed on carrel walls in the new stacks, Alderman Library, University of Virginia, prior to the renovation of the building, 2020-2023. [host]
I have a foot fetish but I'm a girl in a sorority so this is awkward -My life in APhi
